MS MCQs

    Explore and analyze time-stamped data with Time Series Insights - Summary

    »

    1. To which sources you cannot connect a Time Series Insights?

      Cosmos DB

      Event Hubs

      IoT Hub


    2. Which type of storage do you need if you want unlimited retention?

      Cold storage

      Warm storage

      Cosmos DB storage


    3. What is the purpose of Time Series Insights?

      Time Series Insights is a service that allows you to connect your IoT devices

      Time Series Insights is an event ingestion service. It can receive and process millions of events per second.

      Time Series Insights is a real-time analytics service, designed to give you insights on IoT data.


    4. Which type of storage do you need if you want faster queries?

      Cold storage

      Warm storage

      Cosmos DB storage
